The primary hypothesis administration MK-0653H safe tolerable MK-0653H superior single entity Ezetimibe Rosuvastatin percent reduction baseline low-density lipoprotein-cholesterol ( LDL-C ) 12 week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Efficacy Safety MK-0653H Japanese Participants With Hypercholesterolemia ( MK-0653H-832 )
